God is not "worshipped with men's hands, as though He needed anything" [Acts 17:25]. No magnificence of outward display can please God when the 


                                   -103- 

heart is serving idols and the hands are polluted with iniquity. The Holy Spirit will unite with those in the church who, with contrition of heart, will walk humbly with God. To all who look to Him and walk in the footsteps of Christ, He gives sanctification, comfort, and victory over the world.
